title: Intact X-Structures
summary: Intact X-Structures are a very rare aberration that can only be found using Ancient Beacons.
full_text:
Intact X-Structures are a very rare aberration that can only be found using Ancient Beacons. 
Intact X-Structures were added in the Echoes of The Past Update on the 3rd of June 2021.
Intact X-Structures are guarded by Ancient Drones and include the same type of crates found in normal X-Structures. These crates normally drop Ancient Items such as turrets, M-Turrets, and modules, however often have 1k; Korrelite, Reknite, Gellium or Metal Scraps. Intact X-Structures also have their own ambiance and music.

 
 
The Colossus is the in game name used to refer to the most common form of the Intact aberration structures. It has 4 crates maximum filled with a large amount of common or uncommon minerals in the boxes along with some ancient modules.
